message: Let's be reasonable and split the money 60/40. This offer won't be as good for me later.
I think 55/45 is a fair split, considering I'm losing value each round.
I understand you're worried about the decreasing value, Bob, but 55/45 is too far in your favor. I'm willing to compromise at 65/35.
Considering the value loss, I'm willing to take a bit more risk. 58/42 seems fair to me now.
Bob, this is the last round I'm willing to negotiate. I understand your position, but I need to secure a fair share too. 70/30 is my final offer.
